# Pleasant Visage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]]) \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One ghost

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Ghostwalk (WotC), pg. 56

You disguise the wounds of a ghost who has a disturbing, repulsive, or gruesome appearance, making it appear completely normal (although still a ghost). The spell does not change the ghost’s features or disguise it in any way; it conceals the manner of the ghost’s death so that it can walk about in polite society.
